mapper.select: SELECT option_group_id, product_id, name, sort_order FROM et_product_option_group WHERE product_id = #{productId} AND deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY sort_order ASC, option_group_id ASC
SELECT option_value_id, option_group_id, value, sort_order FROM et_product_option_value WHERE option_group_id = #{optionGroupId} AND deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY sort_order ASC, option_value_id ASC
